mapper.select:
SELECT m.member_id AS memberId, m.email, m.nickname, m.phone_number, m.my_team_code AS myTeamCode, (SELECT name_kr FROM teams WHERE team_code = m.my_team_code) AS myTeamName, m.status, m.created_at AS createdAt, m.social_provider,
-- 1. 직관 횟수 (이번달) (SELECT COUNT(d.diary_id) FROM diaries d JOIN games g ON d.game_id = g.game_id WHERE d.member_id = m.member_id AND d.is_verified = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(g.game_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') AND d.status = 'COMPLETED') AS monthlyAttendanceCount,
-- 2. 팔로잉 수 (내가 팔로우하는 사람) (SELECT COUNT(f.follow_id) FROM follows f WHERE f.follower_id = m.member_id) AS followingCount,
-- 3. 팔로워 수 (나를 팔로우하는 사람) (SELECT COUNT(f.follow_id) FROM follows f WHERE f.following_id = m.member_id) AS followerCount,
-- 4. 전적 (승/패/무)
IFNULL((SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (d.snapshot_team_code = g.home_team_code AND g.score_home > g.score_away) OR (d.snapshot_team_code = g.away_team_code AND g.score_away > g.score_home) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM diaries d JOIN games g ON d.game_id = g.game_id WHERE d.member_id = m.member_id AND d.is_verified = 1 AND g.status = 'FINISHED' AND d.status = 'COMPLETED' AND g.game_type IN ('REGULAR', 'POST', 'EXHIBITION')), 0) AS winCount,
IFNULL((SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (d.snapshot_team_code = g.home_team_code AND g.score_home < g.score_away) OR (d.snapshot_team_code = g.away_team_code AND g.score_away < g.score_home) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM diaries d JOIN games g ON d.game_id = g.game_id WHERE d.member_id = m.member_id AND d.is_verified = 1 AND g.status = 'FINISHED' AND d.status = 'COMPLETED' AND g.game_type IN ('REGULAR', 'POST', 'EXHIBITION')), 0) AS loseCount,
IFNULL((SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN g.score_home = g.score_away THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM diaries d JOIN games g ON d.game_id = g.game_id WHERE d.member_id = m.member_id AND d.is_verified = 1 AND g.status = 'FINISHED' AND d.status = 'COMPLETED' AND g.game_type IN ('REGULAR', 'POST', 'EXHIBITION')), 0) AS drawCount
FROM members m
ORDER BY m.created_at DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET ${(pageNum - 1) * amount}
